item.title: Getting hands dirty with KotlinJs
item.author: Author
item.description: Although web development hasn’t been my thing since I started programming, I was really attracted the way Kotlin does solve things. So I did give a try to KotlinJS. **This is how to set up a KotlinJs page in less than an hour.Â ** Note: Chose to use the simplest set up without gradle or maven. You are free to chose what you like. First of all, you start with a new project in your IntelliJ and choose Kotlin -> Javascript.
